body:
How do we know which repo they're in?

On 12 December 2014 at 10:00, Minux Ma <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Or even better, git-review could always use an explicit remote URL when
> pushing
> irrespective of how the user clones the repository (if the user wants to
> clone from
> github or some other mirrors for some reason, we should honor that.)
